Package storesystem.api.deals

Class PriceReductionOnMutiSameItemDeal

java.lang.Object
storesystem.api.deals.Deal<ReductionDealObject>
storesystem.api.deals.PriceReductionDeal
storesystem.api.deals.PriceReductionOnMutiSameItemDeal
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class PriceReductionOnMutiSameItemDeal
extends PriceReductionDeal
This represents a price reduction on a specific quantity of a item
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • PriceReductionOnMutiSameItemDeal

      public PriceReductionOnMutiSameItemDeal​(Item search, int quantity, double reducedPrice)
      Creates a Deal that can be applied to every quantity number of search items found in a ShoppingCart.
      Parameters:
      search - the Item to search which is assigned to SearchItem
      quantity - the quantity to reduce the price
      reducedPrice - the reduced price per item

    • PriceReductionOnMutiSameItemDeal

      public PriceReductionOnMutiSameItemDeal​(Item search, int quantity, double reducedPrice, int max)
      Creates a Deal that can be applied to every quantity number of search items found in a ShoppingCart.
      Parameters:
      search - the Item to search which is assigned to SearchItem
      quantity - the quantity to reduce the price
      reducedPrice - the reduced price per item
      max - the max amount of times this deal can be applied
